title: LIVE! in DC: "A Dark Night" by Edward P. Jones
description: A stormy evening leads to a dark night of the soul. Recorded live at the Lincoln Theatre in Washington, D.C. with musical accompaniment by Élise Cuffy. "A Dark Night" appears in Edward P. Jones' collection LOST IN THE CITY.
author: originals+lbr@stitcher.com (LeVar Burton and Stitcher)
